verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> came כִשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> heard כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> And it came to pass when all the kings הָאֱמֹרִ֡י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> who בְּעֵ֨בֶר <S%H5676><s%> which [were] on the side הַיַּרְדֵּ֜ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan יָ֗מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַלְכֵ֤י <S%H4428><s%> and all the kings הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> which [were] by the sea אֵ֠ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who הוֹבִ֨ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> had dried up יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵ֧י <S%H4325><s%> the waters הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from before בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until [עָבְרָנוּ כ] (עָבְרָ֑ם <S%H5674><s%> alienate ק) וַיִּמַּ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> melted לְבָבָ֗ם <S%H3824><s%> that their heart וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֨יָה <S%H1961><s%> came בָ֥ם עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> any ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> neither was there spirit מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> in them any more because בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua עֲשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> Make לְךָ֖ חַֽרְב֣וֹת <S%H2719><s%> knives צֻרִ֑ים <S%H6697><s%> thee sharp וְשׁ֛וּב <S%H7725><s%> again מֹ֥ל <S%H4135><s%> and circumcise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שֵׁנִֽית׃ <S%H8145><s%> the second time

וַיַּעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> made ל֥וֹ יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua חַֽרְב֣וֹת <S%H2719><s%> knives צֻרִ֑ים <S%H6697><s%> him sharp וַיָּ֙מָל֙ <S%H4135><s%> and circumcised אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at גִּבְעַ֖ת <S%H1389><s%> at the hill הָעֲרָלֽוֹת׃ <S%H6190><s%> of the foreskins

וְזֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> And this [is] the cause אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> why מָ֣ל <S%H4135><s%> did circumcise יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> why Joshua כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> All the people הַיֹּצֵא֩ <S%H3318><s%> that came out מִמִּצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הַזְּכָרִ֜ים <S%H2145><s%> [that were] males כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> all אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> [even] all the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> of war מֵ֤תוּ <S%H4191><s%> died בַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֔רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way בְּצֵאתָ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> after they came out מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Now מֻלִ֣ים <S%H4135><s%> were circumcised הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people הַיֹּֽצְאִ֑ים <S%H3318><s%> that came out וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָ֠עָם <S%H5971><s%> but all the people הַיִּלֹּדִ֨ים <S%H3209><s%> [that were] born בַּמִּדְבָּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way בְּצֵאתָ֥ם <S%H3318><s%> as they came forth מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> out of Egypt לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not מָֽלוּ׃ <S%H4135><s%> [them] they had not circumcised

כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> forty שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years הָלְכ֣וּ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּר֒ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until תֹּ֨ם <S%H8552><s%> were consumed כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּ֜וֹי <S%H1471><s%> till all the people אַנְשֵׁ֤י <S%H376><s%> the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <S%H4421><s%> of war הַיֹּצְאִ֣ים <S%H3318><s%> which came out מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not שָׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> because they obeyed בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> not the voice יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> to whom נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> unto whom the LORD לָהֶ֔ם לְבִלְתִּ֞י <S%H1115><s%> because הַרְאוֹתָ֣ם <S%H7200><s%> that he would not shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> them the land אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֨ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַֽאֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H1><s%> unto their fathers לָ֣תֶת <S%H5414><s%> that he would give לָ֔נוּ אֶ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> us a land זָבַ֥ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָ֖ב <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבָֽשׁ׃ <S%H1706><s%> and honey

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> And their children הֵקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> [whom] he raised up תַּחְתָּ֔ם <S%H8478><s%> their place אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מָ֣ל <S%H4135><s%> circumcised יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> in their stead them Joshua כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עֲרֵלִ֣ים <S%H6189><s%> for they were uncircumcised הָי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> had not מָ֥לוּ <S%H4135><s%> because they had not circumcised אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <S%H1870><s%> them by the way

וַיְהִ֛י <S%H1961><s%> become כַּאֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> they תַּ֥מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> And it came to pass when they had done כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַגּ֖וֹי <S%H1471><s%> all the people לְהִמּ֑וֹל <S%H4135><s%> circumcising וַיֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> that they abode תַחְתָּ֛ם <S%H8478><s%> their places בַּֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> in their places in the camp עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> until חֲיוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H2421><s%> till they were whole פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua הַיּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> This day גַּלּ֛וֹתִי <S%H1556><s%> have I rolled away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶרְפַּ֥ת <S%H2781><s%> the reproach מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> and וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> is called שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> from off you Wherefore the name הַמָּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> of the place הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he גִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> Gilgal עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וַיַּחֲנ֥וּ <S%H2583><s%> encamped בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּגִּלְגָּ֑ל <S%H1537><s%> in Gilgal וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> and kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפֶּ֡סַח <S%H6453><s%> the passover בְּאַרְבָּעָה֩ <S%H702><s%> four עָשָׂ֨ר <S%H6240><s%> teen י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לַחֹ֛דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> of the month בָּעֶ֖רֶב <S%H6153><s%> at even בְּעַֽרְב֥וֹת <S%H6160><s%> in the plains יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> of Jericho

וַיֹּ֨אכְל֜וּ <S%H398><s%> And they did eat מֵעֲב֥וּר <S%H5669><s%> of the old corn הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land מִמָּֽחֳרַ֥ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow הַפֶּ֖סַח <S%H6453><s%> after the passover מַצּ֣וֹת <S%H4682><s%> unleavened cakes וְקָל֑וּי <S%H7033><s%> and parched בְּעֶ֖צֶם <S%H6106><s%> [corn] in the selfsame הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> he

וַיִּשְׁבֹּ֨ת <S%H7673><s%> ceased הַמָּ֜ן <S%H4478><s%> And the manna מִֽמָּחֳרָ֗ת <S%H4283><s%> on the morrow בְּאָכְלָם֙ <S%H398><s%> after they had eaten מֵעֲב֣וּר <S%H5669><s%> of the old corn הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יָה <S%H1961><s%> had ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> longer לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> neither had the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מָ֑ן <S%H4478><s%> manna וַיֹּאכְל֗וּ <S%H398><s%> any more but they did eat מִתְּבוּאַת֙ <S%H8393><s%> of the fruit אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan בַּשָּׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> that year הַהִֽיא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he ס

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came בִּֽהְי֣וֹת <S%H1961><s%> came יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֮ <S%H3091><s%> And it came to pass when Joshua בִּירִיחוֹ֒ <S%H3405><s%> was by Jericho וַיִּשָּׂ֤א <S%H5375><s%> that he lifted up עֵינָיו֙ <S%H5869><s%> his eyes וַיַּ֔רְא <S%H7200><s%> and looked וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> and behold אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> a man עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> and behold there stood לְנֶגְדּ֔וֹ <S%H5048><s%> opposite וְחַרְבּ֥וֹ <S%H2719><s%> over against him with his sword שְׁלוּפָ֖ה <S%H8025><s%> drawn בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> to him וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> unto him and said ל֔וֹ הֲלָ֥נוּ אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> us אִם־ <S%H518><s%> or לְצָרֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6862><s%> adversary

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <S%H559><s%> And he said לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> No כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> rather אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> Nay but [as] captain צְבָֽא־ <S%H6635><s%> of the host יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> now בָ֑אתִי <S%H935><s%> am I now come וַיִּפֹּל֩ <S%H5307><s%> fell יְהוֹשֻׁ֨עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on פָּנָ֥יו <S%H6440><s%> on his face אַ֙רְצָה֙ <S%H776><s%> to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּ֔חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and did worship וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֔וֹ מָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> What אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H136><s%> has my lord מְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> unto him What saith אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עַבְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5650><s%> bondage

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said שַׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> And the captain צְבָ֨א <S%H6635><s%> host יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua שַׁל־ <S%H5394><s%> Loose נַֽעַלְךָ֙ <S%H5275><s%> thy shoe מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from רַגְלֶ֔ךָ <S%H7272><s%> from off thy foot כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הַמָּק֗וֹם <S%H4725><s%> for the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֛ה <S%H859><s%> you עֹמֵ֥ד <S%H5975><s%> whereon thou standest עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> and קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [is] holy ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua כֵּֽן׃ <S%H3651><s%> so
